description: This source file implements the advanced operation functions (PsmFloEngage and PsmFloCancel) for the Psm File Loader Object within the Persistent Storage Manager of the CCSP framework. The functions manage activation and deactivation states of the object, including safety checks for required interfaces.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmFloEngage(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Engages the PSM File Loader object activity by setting its active state to true if prerequisites are met, specifically checking for necessary interface pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmFloCancel(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cancels the activity of the PSM File Loader object by setting its active state to false, with prior check on its current active status.
